name: kooky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a person) strange in his or her appearance or behaviour, especially in a way that is interesting: She's got this kooky, high-pitched voice. Synonyms
barmy mainly UK informal
batty informal disapproving
bonkers informal humorous
cracked (MENTAL HEALTH)
crackers UK informal
dotty UK informal
loco mainly US slang
loony informal
loopy informal
nutty (PERSON) informal
wacky informal
whacky mainly UK informal
